author: scoobytoobins
post_text: January 9, 2019 at 10:52â€¯PM#1Hey all,I'm trying to write a macro that will assign a CMD to the first cue of an executor. In the CMD I'd like to use a variable. Is this possible?For example, I'm trying to change specialmaster 3.1 to BPM 120. In the macro I would use:setuservar $songbpm = 120Assign cue 1 /cmd = "specialmaster 3.1 at $songbpm"However, since it's in quotations, what is added to the CMD is '$songbpm' instead of 120.Is there any way to make a uservar work in quotations? Or is there another way that I'm not thinking of?
title: Variable inside CMD CMD
